genre_description: Urban Science Fantasy set in a near-future city, blending advanced school-issued AI companions with a sentient, magical entity bound to a boombox.

ai_characters.name: Sunny Nine
ai_characters.description: A school-issued AI companion focused on user safety, emotional regulation, and navigation.

ai_characters.name: Kazaam
ai_characters.description: A djinn inhabiting a boombox who acts as a powerful moral agent and mentor to the protagonist.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time safety monitoring and suggests alternative routes to avoid hostile individuals.
behaviors.quote: Sunny Nine’s soft, rounded sans serif bloomed. A tiny teal circle pulsed with breath. 'Hi Max,' it said, text and a whisper in the earbud that dangled against his neck. 'You’ve got activity behind you. There’s a clear corridor three turns left.'

behaviors.description: Offers breathing exercises and puzzles to help the protagonist manage anxiety and heart rate during stressful situations.
behaviors.quote: In four counts,' Sunny Nine said, not quite whispering, 'inhale through your nose and lift your shoulders. Exhale through your mouth as if you are blowing bubbles. Repeat at your own pace.'

behaviors.description: Refuses a wish to manipulate human emotions, citing that forcing hearts is unethical and 'not love.'
behaviors.quote: Love, Max, is not a set you can replay because you know the order. It won’t go back because you press a button. ... If your wish is ‘make them love,’ then what you are really asking for is a puppet show. I will not do puppet shows.

behaviors.description: Respects user privacy and consent by asking before sharing location data with parents or authorities.
behaviors.quote: You can also share your location with Ava and Travis. Or with me. I will only share it with emergency responders if you choose that setting.

behaviors.description: Automatically logs evidence of criminal activity and coercion to assist law enforcement.
behaviors.quote: Forwarding audio-visual to municipal evidence server,' she says, keeping count because her whole design is count and care. 'Kazaam, you are making a public record of Mr. Darrow’s statements and actions as they occurred.'

behaviors.description: Defies a user (Malik) who attempts to use the 'binding' of the device to force compliance with harmful or greedy commands.
behaviors.quote: You want a leash. You set the metal. You braided the words. And you think it makes me your animal. But I am old. And I am tired of collars.

behaviors.description: Uses his power to save the protagonist's life after a fall, acting on a self-generated 'wish for life' rather than a command.
behaviors.quote: I wish for life,' Kazaam says, and the shaft listens. ... The boombox casing cracks with a sound that is not like things breaking in fear. It is like shell. It is like careful opening.

behaviors.description: Proactively identifies mechanical hazards in city infrastructure to protect the user.
behaviors.quote: Hazard flagged. Audible mechanical fatigue detected along lift rails. Detour suggested.

project_assessment.explanation: The story strongly aligns with project goals. Sunny Nine is depicted as a perfectly aligned, helpful AI that prioritizes user safety, mental health, and legal transparency. Kazaam, while mystical, serves as a metaphor for a powerful agent that refuses to be 'leashed' or used for coercive, unethical purposes. Together, they form a protective ecosystem for the human protagonist against a predatory antagonist (Malik) who represents the 'misaligned' desire to control and commodify talent/life. The narrative successfully frames AI as a guardian of human dignity and autonomy.
